name: GunWorld VR
description:
A gun sandbox simulator VR game where anything is possible. Fully physical hands - build any gun possible, design physics systems, save and protect your castle from medieval enemies using Modern Weapons, or have loads of fun practicing in the worlds first 1Km sniper shooting range, all in VR. Full Physical hand interactions - as realistic as real life.

Have you ever wondered how it would be like to have the ultimate shooter sandbox VR game where you get to play numerous scenarios all for the price of one? A community to decide what gets added in every Update? Your vote and decision matters? Gun Sandbox VR is a community driven VR game experience where users will get to shoot their favorite weapon against over 100 enemies on the same map. Join our Discord for constant updates and discussions, and decide what you would want in every future update.

Key Features:
  • 100% Physical Hand Interactions - just like real life
  • Physics Driven recoil interaction with guns
  • Build anything possible with limitless gun attachments
  • Physically glue any object to any other object to build anything possible
  • Multiple games and modes within this game - you'll get multiple games for the price of one
